content.description:
South facing and about 600'. Routes have been done by Paul Cormier 4-5 pitches. Good rock and cool views.

 [ Edit 2018 - It is not clear whether John (who has passed away) was actually referring to climbing on Rogers Ledge or on Square Ledge, a similar cliff/ledge close by and due east of Rogers Ledge.  (see map)  In the blog section of Cathedral Guides website has a 2010 entry for  climbs on Square Ledge.  cathedralmountainguides.com…     (You'll have to copy & paste into your browser, sorry.)    R Hall Oct 2018 ]
